CutSceneText.Text: You've come, [%username]. Sadly, I need to ask you for another major favour.
As you probably know, the Tursin Orcs have retreated and there has been no word of Yurid.
Soldiers have been dispatched to find out where he is.
The scouts dispatched to the Vein of Flame disappeared, so Red Flame Soldiers have now been sent to Barat Forge Caverns.
We don't have any news of them either. Knights have now been dispatched as well... But they too have been missing for a few days.
The dungeons are complicated and as dangerous as a labyrinth, but not to the extent that they would cause all knights to disappear.
At this location?
We believe that the turncoat Yurid is hiding out there too.
Go there with your companions and try to find some leads.
Once this mission is complete, I'll entrust my post to Bellus and go to the Vein of Flame myself.
The entrance to the dungeon is located in Fregion's Throat in the Barat Forge Caverns.
Make sure you are well prepared, as it is a very dangerous location.
I would like to thank you on behalf of all the residents of Tijerid for what you have done.
And to think all these disasters were caused by the Asmodians...
I thought there were no Asmodians left in Sanctum...
I think there are other Asmodians in Elysea, apart from Kalain.
But if we make this public knowledge, it will cause a great deal of confusion in Elysea. Let's keep an eye on the situation.
The Tower of Light is currently denying this situation.
There seems to be plenty of confusion in the Tower of Light as well.
Which is why the 4th Order of Knights went to investigate. Once again, we ended up here while on the trail of the Asmodians.
Omens have also been spotted in Fesra, Erole and Juhdenil, and are being examined.
This is only possible because my companion Aize has the ability to track down omens.
We must prepare ourselves thoroughly. It could easily trigger a 3rd Abyss War.
That doesn't bear thinking about. But we need to think about it as an option.
The world will be plunged into chaos yet again.
Now that the case is closed, I'll return to the Tower of Light.
[%username], I don't know if we'll need your help again some day.
I will ask you for your help again.
